content: Back in NYC after an incredible journey in Japan. It's a bittersweet return, but ready to see what's next.
raw_content: Back in NYC after an incredible journey in Japan. It's a bittersweet return, but ready to see what's next.

content: The city's pace hits different after the calm of Kyoto. Finding my rhythm again.

content: Trying to blend my Japanese sketching inspiration into my work. It's not easy, but it's exciting.
